org.neuroph.nnet.comp.layer

Class Layer2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neuroph.core.Layer
      • org.neuroph.nnet.comp.layer.Layer2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Layer2D
extends Layer
    2D Layer provides 2D layout of the neurons in layer. All the neurons are actually stored in one dimensional array in superclass. This type of layer is used as feature map for convolutional networks
    Author:
    Boris Fulurija, Zoran Sevarac
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
